original_title: King Krule: Live on the Moon
overview: A concert film in which Archy Marshall (a.k.a. King Krule) performs eight tracks from his 2017 album 'The OOZ,' including 'Dum Surfer,' 'The Locomotive,' 'Midnight 01 (Deep Sea Diver),' 'Logos,' 'Sublunary,' 'Lonely Blue,' 'A Slide In (New Drugs),' and 'The Cadet Leaps.'
title: King Krule: Live on the Moon
